(Hektar Modules) Take time to reverse engineer Hektar Tech. [2 fleet boost]

After extensive research, you figured out how to incorporate Hektar technology into personal weaponry.
You can now install Hektar Modules on your crew, though this still requires resources.
Which crew member would you like to configure modules for?
What would you like to do?

[COOLDOWN:45s DURATION:15s] Deploys a bomb that deals 30 damage to all enemy crew in the room and releases poisonous gas which makes nearby enemies take 50% increased damage from any source. Will also be immobile for the duration.
[COOLDOWN:45s DURATION:15s] Increases movement speed, crew damage, repair speed, sabotage speed and heal speed to 1.5x. Also increases damage taken from hazards to 1.5x.
[COOLDOWN:60s] Locks down the occupied room, preventing crew from moving in.
[COOLDOWN:45s DURATION:15s] Deploys a bomb that deals 1 system damage and opens a breach in the current room. Also increases sabotage speed to 1.5x.
[COOLDOWN:45s DURATION:15s] Deploys a bomb that deals 1 ion damage and stuns all all enemy crew in the current room for 5s. Will also be immune to stun and resist mind control.
[COOLDOWN:45s DURATION:15s] Increases ranged damage and sabotage speed to 2x but reduces melee damage to 0.5x.
[COOLDOWN:45s DURATION:15s] Starts a fire in the current room and become immune to fire damage. Allied crew in the same room takes only 0.25x fire damage.
[COOLDOWN:45s DURATION:15s] Takes 0.5x damage from any source and allied crew including self in the same room gain 1.5x Max Health.
[COOLDOWN:30s DURATION:30s] Provides 2 bonus power to current system in the room and takes 0.7x damage from any source.
[COOLDOWN:12s CHARGES:5 AUTO-USE] Increases melee damage, sabotage damage, max health by 0.25x. Doubles door damage. Reduces ranged damage, move speed, repair speed, heal speed by 0.2x.
[COOLDOWN:12s CHARGES:5 AUTO-USE] Increases ranged damage, heal speed, repair speed by 0.25x. Doubles door damage and move speed. Reduces melee damage, sabotage damage, max health by 0.2x.
